name: Bushido II Mountain Running Shoes - Women's

features: Uppers with internal slip-on construction: wraps around the foot like a sock without compressing it or exerting pressure points
New heel designed for maximum comfort of fit
Reinforcements in thermoplastic film for resistance to rubbing and abrasion
EVA layer for better cushioning and impact absorption
The FriXion Red double compound sole has different support surfaces, guaranteeing maximum grip on all types of terrain
Upper: breathable, air mesh with thermoplastic film reinforcements, TPU medial skeleton placed laterally on rip-stop inserts
Midsole: Compressed EVA and Stability Control System
